title: Thirteen: Part Two
description: Thirteen Part 2  Quinn no longer knows up from down, left from right, as the rules of the world blur. He canâ€™t even trust the ache in his heart. Is it for the love he lost or a love trying to form?  As the X Variable closes in, the fabric of reality begins to unravel. There is only one thing Quinn knows for sure,Thirteen is in danger.  No longer being able to tell who is friend and who is foe, Quinn comes to realize he can either save himself or the Other who says he loves Quinn ... Thirteen.
author: Adrienne Wilder
